review: I was given this drug for diverticulitis at the ER.  After 2 days on this medication, my body started shaking uncontrollably from my neck down.  I couldn't get it to stop, and I couldn't sleep, which lead to severe anxiety/depression.  When I went to my doctor 3 days later for follow up she couldn't believe the dosage they put me on when there was no blockage.  She advised that I stay on it 2 more days, but I just couldn't do it.  To this day (and this was in 2019), I still have nerve issues, tremors and anxiety.   If you look up the "brand" name of this drug it's Levaquin which was pulled from the market in 2017.  According to the FDA, doctors should stop treatment with Levaquin, Avelox and similar drugs immediately if patients report experiencing central nervous system side effects, psychiatric adverse reactions, or blood glucose problems.

I will never touch this again!!!
